text: Lauren Doyle (born February 23, 1991) is an American rugby sevens player. She won a silver medal at the 2015 Pan American Games as a member of the United States women's national rugby sevens team and represented the United States of America for Rugby sevens at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==References== == External links == * Lauren Doyle at USA Rugby * * * * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Female rugby sevens players Category:United States international rugby sevens players Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for the United States Category:Pan American Games medalists in rugby sevens Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic rugby sevens players of the United States Category:Eastern Illinois University alumni Category:Sportspeople from Illinois
title: Lauren Doyle
